attributes.action: Begin a full public inquiry of the handling of the Corona Virus Pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
The government insist they have done everything they can yet our death toll remains the largest in Europe with approximately 109,000 deaths which will increase over the coming weeks.

Their untimely failure to shut borders; ensure school safety; enforce lockdown rules and more whilst giving an impression they had done everything in their power to prevent untimely deaths is a travesty on their part.

We need a full public inquiry into their handling of this and we need the answers now.
attributes.background:
The government to be open to full public scrutiny on handling of the coronavirus pandemic which has cost not only millions to lose their jobs and livelihoods but thousands of lives, which in hindsight could have been prevented.

We have had close to a year of restrictions yet nothing to show.
